phrs.translation: 坚强地, 固执地, 强硬地, 是什么意思
去回想你告诉我的那些

sentences.sentence: When I open my eyes, I want to see you live toughly.
sentences.translation: 睁开眼睛我要看你活得坚强。

sentences.sentence: Turkey had earlier bargained toughly (some saiddestructively).
sentences.translation: 土耳其在早先的还价中态度强硬（也有人称气急败坏）。

sentences.sentence: Washington (CNN) — "How do you deal toughly with your bank."
sentences.translation: 华盛顿cnn——你怎样掐住你的银行？
